MessageTypes.label: (v2.5.3+) Annunciator Test Mode
MessageTypes.description: $ = 1 will display all Segments, $ = 0 will restore the display

MessageTypes.label: (v2.5.4+) Set value w/ 'L' or 'R'
MessageTypes.description: $ as string will be displayed with the 'L' or 'R' character, e.g. 'L12.3'

MessageTypes.label: (v2.5.4+) Clear or restore display
MessageTypes.description: $ = 1 will clear the display, $ = 0 will restore the display
